Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory32.jpg'}
{3: "The question catches her completely off guard and her jaw drops. Like a stranded fish, she's unable to say a word."}
{2: 'Elene', 3: 'Uhm... I beg your pardon?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Quit playing dumb already.', 3: '8'}
{3: "The human sounds dead serious as they stare straight into Lamia's soul."}
{2: 'I know what I know.', 3: '10'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lamia', 3: '(Geez, talk about being sensitive... Stop acting like a manga protagonist already.)', 4: '18'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: "(C'mon, think, Lamia...)", 4: '18'}
{2: 'Elene', 3: "I... just paid you a little more attention since we're both new here.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'And that went on for one entire week?', 3: '17'}
{3: 'The human sounds deeply skeptical.'}
{2: 'Elene', 3: "Well... you just don't see people wrapped in bandages every day, do you?", 4: '1'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{2: "But you work at the medical tent, don't you?", 3: '21'}
{2: 'Pretty sure you see people like me all the time there.', 3: '22'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lamia', 3: "(Tsk, not letting me off the hook here, are you... I didn't see this coming at all.)", 4: '18'}
{3: "Lamia might be an expert at disguising, but she's terrible at lying."}
{3: 'She never really bothered honing the art of verbal deceit when her disguises never raised any suspicion.'}
{3: "And to begin with, she's never been good at spinning webs of lies to cover her tracks."}
{2: 'Are you really an outsider like me?', 3: '30'}
{3: 'Like a cold, scrutinizing light, the interrogative gaze meticulously scans Lamia.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryMovieFilm.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory417.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lamia', 3: "Um... I've solved the problem. Can I go outside now?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Worker on Duty', 3: "You're lying. Did you see the answer beforehand?", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory415.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lamia', 3: "I'm feeling a bit unwell... Can we skip the books today?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Medical Staff', 3: "You're lying. According to your vital signs, you're perfectly healthy...", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory414.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lamia', 3: "I'm very hungry... Can I have a bit more to eat, maybe just an energy bar...?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Logistics Staff', 3: "You're lying. Your caloric intake has been precisely calculated...", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory412.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lamia', 3: "I don't feel well. Please don't add more pressure...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Calibration Staff', 3: "You're lying. Continue to apply pressure...", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory543.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lamia', 3: "Don't come any closer. I don't have what you want!", 4: '1'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: 'I just want to live. Stop asking.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory289.png'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryMovieFilm.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory32.jpg'}
{3: 'Faced with those pressing questions, what did she do back then?'}
{3: 'Tears well up in her eyes, slowly tracing a path down her cheeks, only to shatter into droplets upon landing on the rocks.'}
{3: 'Lamia presses her tiny fists against the corners of her eyes, repeatedly brushing away the tears flowing down her cheeks.'}
{3: 'What begins as subdued sobs gradually intensifies, like a compressed spring suddenly released, bursting into resounding wails.'}
{2: 'Elene', 3: 'I... I just... wanted to find a chance to talk to you.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'This is true, as she initially wanted to find out the intentions of the Gray Raven Commandant.'}
{2: 'Elene', 3: "But... for someone... someone like me... sob... I didn't know how to do it...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'This is also true. After all, one of them is an undercover Ascendant, and the other is an undercover elite commandant.'}
{2: 'Elene', 3: "I've been... I've been thinking about what I should do...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'This is still true. Caught in a prolonged dilemma, Lamia finds herself torn between completely ignoring the situation or conducting a kidnapping for later merits.'}
{2: 'Elene', 3: "So I just kept... kept watching you... Sob... I'm sorry... I won't do it anymore...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Elene', 3: "But I really wasn't instructed by anyone... No one in the camp would use someone like me...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Whether she is referring to the present or the past, even she herself cannot tell.'}
{3: 'Lamia keeps wiping her tears but fails in her attempt, not that she intends to anyway.'}
{3: 'By doing so, she can attract the attention of the camp people, and the Gray Raven Commandant would be forced to stop the interrogation.'}
{2: "I'm sorry. I was acting too harsh on you.", 3: '109'}
{3: 'To her surprise, the previously stern human now seems rather inhibited.'}
{3: 'In an almost cautious demeanor, the human offers her a clean handkerchief, their voice softening.'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{2: "I won't press you for anything more.", 3: '113'}
{2: 'So, no more tears, alright?', 3: '114'}
{3: 'The unexpected turn of events catches Lamia off guard, ceasing her cry and turning it into rhythmic sobs.'}
{3: 'However, the human seems to have misinterpreted her reaction, responding with a sarcastic, bitter laugh.'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{2: "I'm sorry. I was overreacting.", 3: '120'}
{2: 'Had some unpleasant experiences in the past.', 3: '121'}
{2: 'Elene', 3: 'Experiences?', 4: '1'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{2: "They don't make good stories.", 3: '125'}
{2: "I'm sorry for suspecting you.", 3: '126'}
{3: 'Lamia stops her sobbing and takes the handkerchief to wipe her tears. As she is about to give it back...'}
{2: 'Keep it. Consider it my way of apologizing.', 3: '128'}
{3: 'Lamia suddenly recalls a book she had read long ago.'}
{3: "It's mentioned in the book that the horizon is twisty on land because there are these things called mountains over there."}
{3: 'That the plants in greenhouses that grow together in large patches on land are called "forests."'}
{3: 'And that...'}
{2: 'Elene', 3: 'Could you... give me a hug?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'What is she longing for at this moment?'}
{3: 'The human in front of her hesitates for a moment, then slowly moves closer.'}
{3: 'As those hands are extended, Lamia notices they are also wrapped in bandages.'}
{3: "The arms tenderly encircle Lamia's petite body, gradually enveloping her."}
{3: "A palm gently rests on Lamia's back, its warmth seeping through as she senses a soft push."}
{3: 'The next second, she falls into a warm embrace, while the human gently pats her back.'}
{2: 'Will this make you feel better?', 3: '142'}
{3: "Lamia leans against the human's chest, sensing a soothing calmness along with rhythmic heartbeats."}
{3: "It's mentioned in the book that over there, a warm hug and comfort will be given to every weeping child."}
{3: 'By the time Lamia could come to the surface, she was no longer a child, her time already frozen.'}
{3: 'What came with crying would not be hugs and comfort but rather the Corrupted or ill-intentioned Scavengers.'}
{3: 'So, even though it\'s only for "Elene", this experience brings enough warmth to Lamia, who has never received a hug or any comfort from others.'}
{3: "Lamia raises her arms, intending to wrap them around the commandant's waist..."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Guard', 3: "Hey! I heard someone crying. Is there anything... What's going on with you two?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: "A beam of flashlight illuminates the scene, and Lamia's hands freeze midway in the air."}
{2: 'Elene', 3: 'I fell down just now, and it hurt... so I started crying.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lamia gently pushes the person in front of her away, explaining.'}
{2: 'Elene', 3: 'Sorry for disturbing everyone.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Guard', 3: "Seriously... It's dark at night, so be careful out here. Probably best to head back soon.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Says the guard impatiently before turning back to his post.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lamia', 3: "(It was just to avoid more questioning. I shouldn't get so carried away...)", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Recalling the urge she felt just now, Lamia lets out a sigh inwardly.'}
{3: "The human's voice comes behind Lamia, expressing gratitude."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Elene', 3: 'You should go to sleep soon, too.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'As if trying to escape the gaze behind her, Lamia quickly strides away.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lamia', 3: "(There probably won't be a next time to be hugged like this, I guess.)", 4: '1'}
